name: Miners' Laundry
description:
This laundry is in charge of cleaning radiactive miners' socks. Drag and drop them onto conveyors and direct the machines. Don't let the disposal system waste too many socks. The game is harder if you are colourblind.

Entry in Mini Jam 76: Radiation
Limitation: One Handed Controls.

Entry in 8 Bits to Infinity: Mundane Jam
Theme: Decay
